statements: DELETE FROM deforestation_biodiversity WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5 AND deforestation_rate < 0.3;
DELETE FROM deforestation_biodiversity WHERE deforestation_rate > 0.2 AND biodiversity_index < 0.7;
DELETE FROM DeforestationEffects WHERE id = 100 AND region = 'Amazon Rainforest';
DELETE FROM SpatialData WHERE latitude > 30.0 OR longitude < -90.0;
DELETE FROM spatial_data WHERE area > 100 AND location_name = 'Forest';
DELETE FROM forest_table WHERE forest_id > 100 AND forest_area < 5000;
